bool Target::isTooClose (  double  targetRange,
double  desiredTargetRange
)  const
 

Checks if range is less then the desired target range, that is are we too close to the target and need to move away.

Parameters:
targetRange the actual range to target in m.
desiredTargetRange the desired range to target in m.
Returns:
true iff we are closer to the target range then the minimal range.

bool Target::isTooFar (  double  targetRange,
double  desiredTargetRange
)  const
 

Checks if the range is further away then the desired target range, that is we are too far away from the target and need to move closer.

Parameters:
targetRange the actual range to target in m.
desiredTargetRange the desired range to target in m.
Returns:
true iff we are further away to the target range then the maximal range.

double  targetRangeMin,
double  targetRangeMax
)  const
 

Checks if the range is within [targetRangeMin targetRangeMax].

Parameters:
targetRange the actual range to target in m.
targetRangeMin the lower bound of the interval.
targetRangeMax the upper bound of the interval.
Returns:
true iff we are within target range else returns false.
